mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Architecture
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Side View of Building "A Turkish Bath," ca 1893
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This photograph shows a side elevation of a masonry and wooden building beside a railroad track. The location is unknown (possibly in the American west or southwest) ca 1893. Large sign on front of building proclaims: "A TURKISH BATH". Image faded to yellowish tan with a darker brown portion at left
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: George Mason University Libraries Special Collections Research Center
